about_the_game: Cookie Invaders is a roguelite shoot 'em up where you utilise a massive skill tree to evolve your ship to defend the earth from legions of invading cookies.
detailed_description: Cookie Invaders is a roguelite shoot 'em up where you utilise a massive skill tree to evolve your ship to defend the earth from legions of invading cookies.

name: Cookie Invaders Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 2.6 GHz Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Cookie Invaders is a roguelite shoot 'em up where you utilise a massive skill tree to evolve your ship to defend the earth from legions of invading cookies.
